entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING, Regina
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:37 p.m. CST Wednesday 19 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Snow and blowing snow. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: Snow. Blowing snow early this evening. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind northeast 40 km/h gusting to 60 diminishing to 20 gusting to 40 this evening. Low minus 4. Wind chill near minus 11. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Wednesday 19 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Snow. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h. High minus 1. Wind chill near minus 10. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Wednesday 19 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Amount 2 cm. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light in the evening. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 7 in the evening and minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Wednesday 19 April 2023
